COMMAND.name: quit
COMMAND.help: Quit this CLI session

COMMAND.name: top
COMMAND.help: Go back to the main CLI level

COMMAND.name: up
COMMAND.help: Go back to the previous CLI menu level

COMMAND.name: ap
COMMAND.help: Mesh Access Point decribes general configuration

COMMAND.name: security
COMMAND.help: Mesh Access Point Security describes security parameters

COMMAND.name: ap show
COMMAND.help: Show information

PARAM.name: AccessPointIndex
PARAM.help: AccessPointIndex parameter: number, range ([n-m]) or wildcard(*) - by default

COMMAND.name: ap update
COMMAND.help: Update management objects information of the appropriated component

COMMAND.name: ap config
COMMAND.help: Configure parameters of the object

PARAM.name: AccessPointIndex
PARAM.help: AccessPointIndex parameter: number, range ([n-m]) or wildcard(*)

COMMAND.ACTION: cliParams="" if [ ${ssid} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"SSID = '${ssid}',";fi if [ ${multiapmode} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"MultiApMode = '${multiapmode}',";fi if [ ${band24g} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"Band2_4G = '${band24g}',";fi if [ ${band5gl} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"Band5GL = '${band5gl}',";fi if [ ${band5gh} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"Band5GH = '${band5gh}',";fi if [ ${band6g} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"Band6G = '${band6g}',";fi cliParams=$(echo $cliParams | sed 's/,$//') if [ -z "$cliParams" ]; then cliParams = "null" echo "No parameter is specified for set operation" else /usr/lib/lua/mmx/mmx_cli_utils.lua mmObjInstance=Device.WiFi.DataElements.Network.AccessPoint.${AccessPointIndex}. sectionId=prpl_ap_1 type=set cliParamsStr="$cliParams" fi

COMMAND.name: ap add
COMMAND.help: Add a new instance of the object
COMMAND.ACTION: cliParams="" if [ ${ssid} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"SSID = '${ssid}',";fi if [ ${multiapmode} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"MultiApMode = '${multiapmode}',";fi if [ ${band24g} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"Band2_4G = '${band24g}',";fi if [ ${band5gl} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"Band5GL = '${band5gl}',";fi if [ ${band5gh} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"Band5GH = '${band5gh}',";fi if [ ${band6g} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"Band6G = '${band6g}',";fi cliParams=$(echo $cliParams | sed 's/,$//') if [ -z "$cliParams" ]; then /usr/lib/lua/mmx/mmx_cli_utils.lua mmObjInstance=Device.WiFi.DataElements.Network.AccessPoint. sectionId=prpl_ap_1 type=add else /usr/lib/lua/mmx/mmx_cli_utils.lua mmObjInstance=Device.WiFi.DataElements.Network.AccessPoint. sectionId=prpl_ap_1 type=add cliParamsStr="$cliParams" fi

COMMAND.name: ap del
COMMAND.help: Delete an instance of the object

PARAM.name: AccessPointIndex
PARAM.help: AccessPointIndex parameter: number, range ([n-m]) or wildcard(*)

COMMAND.name: security show
COMMAND.help: Show information

PARAM.name: AccessPointIndex
PARAM.help: AccessPointIndex parameter: number, range ([n-m]) or wildcard(*) - by default

COMMAND.name: security update
COMMAND.help: Update management objects information of the appropriated component

COMMAND.name: security config
COMMAND.help: Configure parameters of the object

PARAM.name: AccessPointIndex
PARAM.help: AccessPointIndex parameter: number, range ([n-m]) or wildcard(*)

PARAM.name: keypassphrase
PARAM.help: The passphrase for connecting to the Access Point

PARAM.name: saepassphrase
PARAM.help: The SAE Passphrase (Simultaneous Authentication of Equals) is a new authentication algorithm for WPA3 that replaces the Pre-Shared Key used in WPA2.

COMMAND.ACTION: cliParams="" if [ ${modeenabled} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"ModeEnabled = '${modeenabled}',";fi if [ ${psk} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"PreSharedKey = '${psk}',";fi if [ ${keypassphrase} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"KeyPassphrase = '${keypassphrase}',";fi if [ ${saepassphrase} ]; then cliParams=$cliParams"SAEPassphrase = '${saepassphrase}',";fi cliParams=$(echo $cliParams | sed 's/,$//') if [ -z "$cliParams" ]; then cliParams = "null" echo "No parameter is specified for set operation" else /usr/lib/lua/mmx/mmx_cli_utils.lua mmObjInstance=Device.WiFi.DataElements.Network.AccessPoint.${AccessPointIndex}.Security. sectionId=prpl_ap_2 type=set cliParamsStr="$cliParams" fi
